body_html:
I've tracked the problem down to an AVX512 specific function in Eigen/src/Core/arch/CUDA/PacketMathHalf.h and have submitted a PR to Eigen that should fix the issue:

https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/407/fix-the-packet16h-version-of-ptranspose/diff
body_text:
I've tracked the problem down to an AVX512 specific function in Eigen/src/Core/arch/CUDA/PacketMathHalf.h and have submitted a PR to Eigen that should fix the issue:
https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/407/fix-the-packet16h-version-of-ptranspose/diff
body:
I've tracked the problem down to an AVX512 specific function in Eigen/src/Core/arch/CUDA/PacketMathHalf.h and have submitted a PR to Eigen that should fix the issue:

https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/407/fix-the-packet16h-version-of-ptranspose/diff
